[y,Error] = forwardEuler(@(t,y) t + y,0,1,1/4,0, @(t) exp(t) - t - 1)
%b
[y,Error] = forwardEuler(@(t,y) t - y,0,1,1/4,0, @(t) exp(-t) + t -1)
%c
[y,Error] = forwardEuler(@(t,y) 4*t - 2*y,0,1,1/4,0, @(t) exp(-2*t) +2*t - 1)
\end{verbatim}
